1: שִׁ֗יר <sup>7892 </sup> <n>A Song</n> הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <sup>4609 </sup> <n>of degrees</n> אַ֭שְׁרֵי <sup>835 </sup> <n>Blessed</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>is everyone</n> יְרֵ֣א <sup>3373 </sup> <n>[is] every one that feareth</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> הַ֝הֹלֵ֗ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>that walketh</n> בִּדְרָכָֽיו׃ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in his ways</n>
2: יְגִ֣יעַ <sup>3018 </sup> <n>the labour</n> כַּ֭פֶּיךָ <sup>3709 </sup> <n>of thine hands</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תֹאכֵ֑ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>For thou shalt eat</n> אַ֝שְׁרֶ֗יךָ <sup>835 </sup> <n>happy</n> וְט֣וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[shalt] thou [be] and [it shall be] well</n> לָֽךְ׃
3: אֶשְׁתְּךָ֤ ׀ <sup>802 </sup> <n>Thy wife</n> כְּגֶ֥פֶן <sup>1612 </sup> <n>vine</n> פֹּרִיָּה֮ <sup>6509 </sup> <n>[shall be] as a fruitful</n> בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֪י <sup>3411 </sup> <n>by the sides</n> בֵ֫יתֶ֥ךָ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of thine house</n> בָּ֭נֶיךָ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>thy children</n> כִּשְׁתִלֵ֣י <sup>8363 </sup> <n>plants</n> זֵיתִ֑ים <sup>2132 </sup> <n>like olive</n> סָ֝בִ֗יב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> לְשֻׁלְחָנֶֽךָ׃ <sup>7979 </sup> <n>thy table</n>
4: הִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> כִי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כֵ֭ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>thus</n> יְבֹ֥רַךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>be blessed</n> גָּ֗בֶר <sup>1397 </sup> <n>Behold that thus shall the man</n> יְרֵ֣א <sup>3373 </sup> <n>that feareth</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
5: יְבָרֶכְךָ֥ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>shall bless</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> מִצִּ֫יּ֥וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>thee out of Zion</n> וּ֭רְאֵה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and thou shalt see</n> בְּט֣וּב <sup>2898 </sup> <n>the good</n> יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>of Jerusalem</n> כֹּ֝֗ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יְמֵ֣י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>all the days</n> חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of thy life</n>
6: וּרְאֵֽה־ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Yea thou shalt see</n> בָנִ֥ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>thy children's</n> לְבָנֶ֑יךָ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>children</n> שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>[and] peace</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>be upon</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>upon Israel</n>
